item.title: 据说招商局资本和 KKR 考虑竞购 Loscam
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，招商局资本和包括 KKR & Co. 在内的私募股权基金是考虑竞购托盘制造商洛斯卡姆亚太有限公司的公司之一。【原文：China Merchants Capital and private equity funds including KKR & Co. are among firms considering bids for pallet maker Loscam Asia Pacific Co., according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 南非西开普省暴风雨导致 35,000 所房屋受损
item.description: 南非西开普省执行市长吉奥丁-希尔-刘易斯（Geordin Hill-Lewis）说，袭击该省的暴风雨已导致开普敦市 35,000 多户家庭遭受洪灾损失。【原文：Storms that pounded South Africa’s Western Cape province have led to flood damage affecting more than 35,000 households in the city of Cape Town, Executive Mayor Geordin Hill-Lewis said.】

item.title: 印尼盾将迎来八年来最长涨势，普拉博沃寻求缓解债务担忧
item.description: 印尼为缓解对国家财政前景的担忧而采取的举措，以及对美联储进一步降息的押注不断增加，使印尼盾出现了近八年来的最佳涨势。【原文：Indonesia’s moves to ease concern over the nation’s fiscal outlook and growing bets for more Federal Reserve interest-rate cuts sent the rupiah on its best rally in almost eight years.】

item.title: 瑞典 6 月通胀支持瑞典央行进一步降息
item.description: 瑞典上个月的基本通胀率放缓幅度超过预期，为瑞典央行继续降低借贷成本铺平了道路。【原文：Sweden’s underlying inflation slowed more than expected last month, paving the way for the Riksbank to continue taking borrowing costs lower.】

item.title: 日本家庭预期通胀将创历史之最
item.description: 日本家庭认为未来几年的通胀率将达到创纪录的水平，随着日元的快速贬值加大了对生活成本的压力，通胀率的上升将支持日本央行在短期内提高利率。【原文：Japan’s households see inflation at record levels over the coming years, an uptick that will support the case for the Bank of Japan to raise interest rates in the near-term as the yen’s rapid depreciation ramps up pressure on the cost of living.】

item.description: 周五，随着日本当局疑似干预和利率检查的积极影响开始消退，日元在波澜不惊的交易中下滑。【原文：The yen slipped in choppy trading on Friday as the positive impact of suspected intervention and rate checks by Japanese authorities began to fade.】

item.title: 分析师称日元跳升减轻日本央行收紧政策的压力
item.description: 多位分析师认为，周四日元因日本疑似干预而大幅反弹，可能会减轻日本央行在本月底积极收紧货币政策的压力。【原文：Thursday’s sharp yen rally on suspected Japanese intervention may reduce pressure on the central bank to tighten monetary policy aggressively at the end of this month, according to several analysts.】

item.title: 国泰航空考虑提升其科维德事件后的恢复时间表
item.description: 国泰航空公司一位熟知内情的人士表示，由于该公司的飞行员招聘计划按计划进行，加上旅游需求依然旺盛，预计航班量将在2025年的头几周从科维德全面反弹。【原文：Cathay Pacific Airways Ltd. expects flight volumes to fully rebound from Covid in the first few weeks of 2025, a person familiar with the matter said, as the airline’s pilot recruitment program goes according to plan and demand for travel remains buoyant.】

item.title: 印尼提供 95 年的新资本使用权以吸引投资者

item.title: 民调显示：大选引发风险，欧洲央行将缓慢降息
item.description: 彭博社对分析师的调查显示，由于政治动荡给通胀率重返2%带来了一系列风险，欧洲央行将采取谨慎的降息措施。【原文：The European Central Bank will take a measured approach to lowering interest rates as political upheaval opens up a litany of risks to inflation’s return to 2%, according to a Bloomberg survey of analysts.】

item.title: 澳门赌场收入减少，澳门赌场股票将第五周下跌
item.description: 由于中国游客减少，博彩收入下降，澳门赌场运营商的股票将迎来第五周下跌，这是一年多来最长的连续下跌。【原文：Macau casino operators’ shares are poised for their fifth weekly drop, the longest such streak in over a year, as a decline in Chinese tourists dent gaming income.】

item.description: 炎炎夏日和旷日持久的印度大选可能会在这个财报季产生一些不太可能的赢家和输家，与消费相关的企业 Avenue Supermarts Ltd. 和 Bajaj Auto Ltd. 将于下周发布财报。【原文：A scorching summer and a long-drawn election in India may throw up some unlikely winners and losers this earnings season with consumption-linked firms Avenue Supermarts Ltd. and Bajaj Auto Ltd. slated to report next week.】

item.description: 由于人工智能投资热潮不断超出预期，台湾半导体制造股份有限公司今年 4,200 亿美元的涨势可能会因为另一个强劲的季度收益而得到推动。【原文：Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co.’s $420 billion rally this year may get supercharged by another strong quarterly earnings, as an artificial intelligence investment boom keeps beating expectations.】

item.title: 亚洲最大另类资产管理公司酝酿成立新的中国基金，扭转缩减趋势

item.title: 美国温和通胀引发风险情绪，石油连续第三天上涨
item.description: 石油连续第三天上涨，原因是有迹象表明美国即将降息，这刺激了更广泛的金融市场的乐观情绪，从而推动了石油期货的上涨。【原文：Oil rose for a third day as optimism in wider financial markets, spurred by indications that US interest-rate cuts are on the way, helped to propel futures higher.】

item.title: 散户投资者从英国股票基金撤资 18 亿英镑，创历史新高
item.description: 5 月份，散户投资者从英国股票基金撤资 18 亿英镑（约合 23 亿美元），这是该不受宠行业有史以来最糟糕的一个月。【原文：Retail investors withdrew £1.8 billion ($2.3 billion) from UK equity funds in May, the worst month on record for the unloved sector.】
